title: Google\Cloud\OrgPolicy\V2\Constraint\ListConstraint
name: ListConstraint
description:
A Constraint that allows or disallows a list of string values, which are configured by an Organization's policy administrator with a Policy.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.orgpolicy.v2.Constraint.ListConstraint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.supports_in
params.description: Indicates whether values grouped into categories can be used in Policy.allowed_values and Policy.denied_values. For example, "in:Python" would match any value in the 'Python' group.

params.name: data.supports_under
params.description: Indicates whether subtrees of Cloud Resource Manager resource hierarchy can be used in Policy.allowed_values and Policy.denied_values. For example, "under:folders/123" would match any resource under the 'folders/123' folder.
